item.title: How to add text on a npc?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“mistakengod, post:1, topic:412596”]I want to let my npc talk so it teleports you to a certain place :

I’ve add this in dialoguehandler.java :

case 70: sendNpcChat4("I have found two secret tunnels!", "I saw a giant mole and a Kalphite Queen!", "Help me defeating them?", "Would you like me, to bring you there?", c.talkingNpc, "Torbrund"); c.nextChat = 71; break; case 71: sendOption2("Giant Mole", "Kalphite Queen"); c.dialogueAction = 13; c.dialogueId = 71; c.teleAction = -1; break; } }

well If I talk to torbrund nothing happens…

please help[/quote]
Case 97 or 98 not sure, add in the Dialogue ID and you want the Dialogue option to do

Read full topic
item.source: How to add text on a npc?

item.title: How to add text on a npc?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I want to let my npc talk so it teleports you to a certain place :

I’ve add this in dialoguehandler.java :

case 70: sendNpcChat4("I have found two secret tunnels!", "I saw a giant mole and a Kalphite Queen!", "Help me defeating them?", "Would you like me, to bring you there?", c.talkingNpc, "Torbrund"); c.nextChat = 71; break; case 71: sendOption2("Giant Mole", "Kalphite Queen"); c.dialogueAction = 13; c.dialogueId = 71; c.teleAction = -1; break; } }

well If I talk to torbrund nothing happens…

please help

Read full topic
item.source: How to add text on a npc?
